name: Simulate template matches overlapping legacy and composable templates

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-9.1.0-9732617aa9f8527e2ee625a8522bd5ece628d12e "index template [v2_template] has index patterns [test*] matching patterns from existing older templates [v1_template] with patterns (v1_template => [test*, t1*]); this template [v2_template] will take precedence during new index creation"
